Avoid local variables shadowing class fields
metric.english:
This rule will check whether local variables are shadowing class fields.
In case of C#, classes as well as structs are considered. In case of Visual Basic, modules also considered in addition to classes.
In case of classes, only non-private fields of Base classes are considered.
